questions.question: I knew why I ………………………..
questions.description: We use a past perfect (passive) here because the main verb is in the past tense.

questions.question: My life …………………………. by that book.
questions.description: We use the passive form of the simple past here because the subject is not the doer of the action.

questions.question: A friend of ours ………………………….. the roof.
questions.description: The present continuous is used here because we are talking about an ongoing situation.

questions.question: You will be called when your time ………………………….
questions.description: When the verb in the main clause is in the future tense, we use a present tense in the subordinate clause to refer to future.

questions.question: She ……………………………. a bath when she heard a knock on the door.
questions.description: The past continuous is used to talk about the longer background action that was going on when another action took place.

questions.question: This color …………………………… me.
questions.description: We use the simple present to talk about facts.

questions.question: She ………………………….. her mother.
questions.description: We use the simple present to talk about facts, truths etc.

questions.question: These carpets ………………………… by child workers in Asia.
You …………………………… five thousand dollars last year.
questions.description: Were lent is the passive form of lent.

questions.question: He ……………………….. an invitation.
questions.description: Was sent is the passive form of sent.
